MOLECULAR MODELLING

  • PyMol running script

  • AutoDock http://autodock.scripps.edu/

  • CCP4 Macromolecular X-Ray Crystallography,

PanDDA overlap multiple crystal structures with different ligands with the same protein to detect pocket
